org.firebirdsql.ds

Class FBConnectionPoolDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firebirdsql.ds.RootCommonDataSource
      • org.firebirdsql.ds.FBAbstractCommonDataSource
        • org.firebirdsql.ds.FBConnectionPoolDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.naming.Referenceable, javax.sql.CommonDataSource, javax.sql.ConnectionPoolDataSource, FirebirdConnectionProperties

    public class FBConnectionPoolDataSource
extends FBAbstractCommonDataSource
implements javax.sql.ConnectionPoolDataSource, javax.naming.Referenceable
    Bare-bones implementation of ConnectionPoolDataSource.

    Please be aware that this is not a connectionpool. This class provides PooledConnection objects for connection pool implementations (eg as provided by a JEE application server). If you need a standalone connectionpool, consider using a connectionpool implementation like c3p0, BoneCP or DBCP.

    Since:
    2.2
    Author:
    Mark Rotteveel

      • checkNotStarted

        protected void checkNotStarted()
        Description copied from class: FBAbstractCommonDataSource
        Method to check if this DataSource has not yet started.

        Implementations should throw IllegalStateException when the DataSource is already in use and modifying properties is not allowed.

        Specified by:
        checkNotStarted in class FBAbstractCommonDataSource
